<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>If a Scripted REST API resource has 'requires_snc_internal_role' set to false, then keep it false, otherwise check 'requires_authentication' to determine its value as follows: If a Scripted REST API resource has 'requires_authentication' set to true, then set 'requires_snc_internal' to true. If a Scripted REST API resource has 'requires_authentication' set to false, then set 'requires_snc_internal' to false.</description> <name>Set Requires SNC Internal field</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_ws_operation'); gr.query(); while(gr.next()) { if(gr.getValue('requires_snc_internal_role') === '0') continue; if(gr.getValue('requires_authentication') == true) gr.setValue('requires_snc_internal_role', true); else gr.setValue('requires_snc_internal_role', false);
gr.update(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-01-06 00:32:16</sys_created_on> <sys_id>330c71a8532b030073da6dbda11c085c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Set Requires SNC Internal field</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">b0854379db01111086a072c7f496191b</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_330c71a8532b030073da6dbda11c085c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-01-30 19:32:28</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
